short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will open up a random episode of the Waveform Podcast with MKBHD every time you open a new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: As the producer for the Waveform Podcast it's my job to think of fun things to do with the pod. Here's my first experiment! This extension will open up a random episode of the Waveform Podcast with MKBHD every time you open a new tab.
